title: Pera orange juice (Citrus sinensis L. Osbeck) alters lipid metabolism and attenuates oxidative stress in the heart and liver of rats treated with doxorubicin
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Ronny Peterson Cabral, Ana Paula Dantas Ribeiro, Marina Gaiato Monte, Anderson Seiji Soares Fujimori, Carolina Rodrigues Tonon, Natalia Fernanda Ferreira, Silmeia Garcia Zanatti, Marcos Ferreira Minicucci, Leonardo Antonio Mamede Zornoff, Sergio Alberto Rupp de Paiva, Bertha Furlan Polegato
